feedback.Footwork: Work on planting the front foot ~30° open; over/under rotation is affecting stability.
feedback.Head Position: Head stays steady over the knee — solid!
feedback.Swing Control: Elbow extension looks controlled through impact.
feedback.Balance: Reduce spine lean; think ‘tall chest’ to keep balance over the stance.
feedback.Follow-through: Follow-through duration is healthy; let the bat finish high.
